text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0734 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
0 Normal groupingNormal grouping
1 Invalid or missing primary diagnosisInvalid or missing primary diagnosis
2 Diagnosis is not allowed to be primaryDiagnosis is not allowed to be primary
3 Data does not fulfill DRG criteriaData does not fulfill DRG criteria
4 Invalid age, admission date, date of birth or discharge dateInvalid age, admission date, date of birth or discharge date
5 Invalid genderInvalid gender
6 Invalid discharge statusInvalid discharge status
7 Invalid weight ad admissionInvalid weight ad admission
8 Invalid length of stayInvalid length of stay
9 Invalid field "same day"Invalid field "same day"

name: GrouperStatus
title: grouperStatus
description: Code system of concepts specifying the status of a grouper in general.  US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0734 (Grouper Status)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
